Install Parse Failed Error

Failure [INSTALL_PARSE_FAILED_INCONSISTENT_CERTIFICATES]

This error can happen when you have used an Android device on a different development machine. There is a signature on the device that came from the old development machine, that is the one getting in the way.

Solution

Just delete the Android applications that are installed on the device which came from your old development machine, then try to rebuild â€” ant release install or ant debug install
